businesses.name: Canine Comprehension Pty Ltd
businesses.business_details:
Canine Comprehension was envisioned through the personal experience of Sarah, who is the owner and director.
Sarah’s own journey of education was difficult as a child and through university. 
She began to link her two joys, teaching and her beloved dogs. 

Sarah and her team are passionate about the benefits of animal assisted support to help children be the best they can be. Their vision is ingrained in what they do every day: to provide accessible support to young people through dog assisted learning.

The team also strive to follow their mission: supporting those who love and care for young people by delivering student centred approaches which inspire learning.
businesses.product_details:
P - 12 Tutoring. Online at the moment. Having positive connections provides young people with a balanced perspective. It can be easy to get lost in one’s own negative thoughts during this time. Our tutors & their dogs can offer support and a creative, intellectual outlet.

Our focus:
Teaches emotional literacy through engaging sessions,
lowers anxiety around learning with a focus on mindfulness,
Is student focused with a foundation in Positive Education practices,
increased positive interactions through Dog Assisted Learning, 
Is about measurable results
businesses.new_products:
Our Dog Assisted Learning sessions are:
- Engaging and motivating, designed to create a virtual space where open discussions can be held
- The opportunity to reach educational goals
- Students becomes calmer and begin to understand their feelings and how to regulate them
businesses.headline: Canine Comprehension Pty Ltd
